actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A concurrent resolution creating the Joint Select Committee on Government Program Analysis and Evaluation.

summary.text: Establishes the Joint Select Committee on Government Program Analysis and Evaluation to make a full and complete study and appraisal of all programs and activities of the U.S. Government and any other method, procedure, or proposal designed to secure the objectives enumerated in this resolution, to determine which proposal or combination of proposals may result in the most proper and beneficial evaluation of the efficiency and effectiveness of Federal programs and activities by objective, scientific, and empirical analysis and in the most practical, expeditious, efficient, and effective manner. Requires the committee to submit a comprehensive report of its study to the Congress.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution creating the Joint Select Committee on Government Program Analysis and Evaluation.
